tasks.label: Build Debug
args: $msbuild = & { if (Test-Path 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\MSBuild\Current\Bin\MSBuild.exe') { 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\MSBuild\Current\Bin\MSBuild.exe' } }; if ($msbuild) { & $msbuild '${workspaceFolder}\goblin-stream.vcxproj' /p:Configuration=Debug /p:Platform=x64 /p:RuntimeLibrary=MultiThreadedDebug /m } else { Write-Error 'MSBuild not found. Ensure Visual Studio 2022 Community is installed.' }

tasks.label: Build Release
args: $msbuild = & { if (Test-Path 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\MSBuild\Current\Bin\MSBuild.exe') { 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\MSBuild\Current\Bin\MSBuild.exe' } }; if ($msbuild) { & $msbuild '${workspaceFolder}\goblin-stream.vcxproj' /p:Configuration=Release /p:Platform=x64 /p:RuntimeLibrary=MultiThreaded /m } else { Write-Error 'MSBuild not found. Ensure Visual Studio 2022 Community is installed.' }

tasks.label: Build and Run Debug
args: $msbuild = & { if (Test-Path 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\MSBuild\Current\Bin\MSBuild.exe') { 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\MSBuild\Current\Bin\MSBuild.exe' } }; if ($msbuild) { & $msbuild '${workspaceFolder}\goblin-stream.vcxproj' /p:Configuration=Debug /p:Platform=x64 /p:RuntimeLibrary=MultiThreadedDebug /m; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { & '${workspaceFolder}\bin\Debug\goblin-stream.exe' } } else { Write-Error 'MSBuild not found. Ensure Visual Studio 2022 Community is installed.' }
